IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: WSF ENHANCES WILD SHEEP POPULATIONS, PROMOTES SCIENTIFIC WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT, AND EDUCATES THE PUBLIC AND YOUTH ON SUSTAINABLE USE AND THE CONSERVATION BENEFITS OF HUNTING WHILE PROMOTING THE INTERESTS OF THE HUNTER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE F, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 3
SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANTEES PROVIDE REPORTS TO THE FOUNDATION ON USE OF THE GRANT FUNDS AND RESULTS ACHIEVED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE J, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 7

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WSF ENHANCES WILD SHEEP POPULATIONS, PROMOTES SCIENTIFIC WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT, AND EDUCATES THE PUBLIC AND YOUTH ON SUSTAINABLE USE AND THE CONSERVATION BENEFITS OF HUNTING WHILE PROMOTING THE INTERESTS OF THE HUNTER.
EXECUTIVE COMMITTE HAS AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF BOARD WITH LATER RATIFICATION BY FULL BOARD.
VOLUNTEERS DONATE THEIR TIME TO OPERATE THE FOUNDATIONS ANNUAL FUNDRAISING EVENT.

THE RETURN WAS REVIEWED BY AN OUTSIDE ADVISER AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. AFTER APPROVAL BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE IT IS APPROVED BY THE FINANCE AND BUDGET COMMITTE AND FINALLY BY THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS.
ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE FORM IS SIGNED BY EACH BOARD MEMBER ANNUALLY.

A THREE PERSON COMMITTEE REVIEWS INDUSTRY COMPENSATION GUIDELINES INCLUDING THE GUIDESTAR NON-PROFIT COMPENSATION REPORT AND THE ECONOMIC RESEARCH INSTITUTE'S NON-PROFIT SALARY SURVEY BEFORE RECOMMENDING COMPENSATION TO BE PAID. FINAL COMPENSATION APPROVAL IS BY THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

A THREE PERSON COMMITTEE REVIEWS INDUSTRY COMPENSATION GUIDELINES INCLUDING THE GUIDESTAR NON-PROFIT COMPENSATION REPORT AND THE ECONOMIC RESEARCH INSTITUTE'S NON-PROFIT SALARY SURVEY BEFORE RECOMMENDING COMPENSATION TO BE PAID.
GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC FOR INSPECTION AT THE FOUNDATIONS HEADQUARTERS AS WELL AS BEING POSTED ON THEIR WEBSITE.
